Title: We're Bad People
Writer: Peter Nowalk (created by), Sarah L. Thompson, Erika Harrison (executive story editor), Fernanda Coppel (story editor), Morenike Balogun (story editor)
Actors: Viola Davis, Billy Brown, Alfred Enoch, Jack Falahee
Plot: With Annalise in jail on charges of arson and first-degree murder, the Keating 4 try to cope with Wes' death.
